title: Player disrespecting fellow teammates and abusing role privileges.
body:
Username INB4lLL was harassing teammates during a game played at 20/02/15 9:28PM. Username KittyFapKatarina was witness to this and can easily be called to back up my facts.

I believe some sort of punishment is in order, as player INB4lLL is obviously underage and only wants to vandalize and ruin the experience for other players.

Please reply as soon as possible, I want to get this game cleaned up and make it as fun as possible for the rest of the community.

Kind Regards,
Penile Facility.

replies.body: I know this Inb4kill in real life and he is constantly telling me how this penile facility is bullying him in the game even though he has done nothing to harm this player.

> [{quoted}](name=InB4Kill,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=VAs4RpOE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-20T10:54:53.913+0000)
>
> I know this Inb4kill in real life and he is constantly telling me how this penile facility is bullying him in the game even though he has done nothing to harm this player.

u mum
{{summoner:17}}
i know u and u are illuminate RITO GET HIM!!!!{{summoner:6}}

Name-calling is not allowed on the boards. You do this with the best intentions, but the boards just isn't the right place to do it. The in game report system should be enough to account for just about any violation of the Summoner's Code, but if you truly believe that it is *not* enough, then you can create a support ticket and send it into Riot confidentially.

Remove this person's summoner name as soon as possible.
